testcase.name: Sorting our search results by star rating
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Sorting our search results by star rating Given We are on the search results page ... passed in 4.249s When We click the sort by button ... passed in 0.089s And We select the star rating filter ... passed in 0.069s Then Our results will be filtered by price low to high ... passed in 2.840s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
